did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Audio recordings, computer media, printed materials, correspondence.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, creative and academic writings, and musical work, including scores, sheet music, and programs and broadsides for musical performances; also, audiocassettes, phonodiscs,videotapes, and CDs and DVDs of digitized material.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, creative and academic writings, and musical work, including scores, sheet music, and programs and broadsides for musical performances; also, audiocassettes, phonodiscs,videotapes, and CDs and DVDs of digitized material.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Lionel Wolberger Papers, #4990. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. Writing & Performance Materials
Box 1

did.unittitle: Elementary / High School and early University Writings

scopecontent.p: Poems, typed and hand-written, primarily from elementary school; a high school biology project; report cards; a high school graduation certificate; academic essays at the high school and undergraduate-level; song lyrics; a published poem in Praxis (Volume 4, Number 2); a blue-hued idea notebook (1978-1979); and an essay, titled "Universe Unfolding," marked by Wolberger.
Musical notation; essays on the Torah and Judaism; poems; a copy of Wolberger's oral examination on ethnomusicology and Jewish music (1987); performance posters; and, a copy of Wolberger's MA thesis.

Letters of recommendation from Yale University; a certificate of appreciation from the American Zionist Movement Zionist Song Competition; musical notation; draft copy of Love in the First Degree: a Musical in One Act; copy of Rainbow Warrior; musical notation and draft copy of The Enchanted; and, draft copy of Peace Cantata.

did.unittitle: "Hoot Night" Set List, Song Introductions, Lyrics and Chords

scopecontent.p: Black notebook (bound); includes lyrics with accompanying chords.

did.unittitle: Newspaper Clippings, Performance Fliers, and Miscellanea
The Coop: The Fast Folk Musical Magazine

scopecontent.p: Three copies; side two / song five: "Drawing the Map" by Lionel Wolberger; copies two and three include a copy of "The Coop" publication
